name: Super 19th Century Philosophers 64
description:
Super 19th Century Philosophers 64 is a top-down, sword fighting, melee rogue-like made in UE5 with a PS1 aesthetics. Inspired by fighting games like Guilty Gear and Tekken. 

Keep the combo going. More kills in a combo -> more experience -> more tools to use. 

Fight as Karl Marx against horde of bourgeoise enemies.

Gamepad is recommended, but keyboard and mouse works as well. 

The game is still very much a work in progress.

Ver 0.3:

Initial public release.
